originalText.text: I’ll be honest, before I found Carolina, the whole sleep situation with my 9-month-old was a hot mess. She was stuck in this cycle of needing to be fed to sleep, waking up all night for a little milk, and then only napping for like 30 to 45 minutes. We were dealing with a cranky baby and, honestly, I was just as cranky from the lack of sleep. I was really on the fence about sleep training. I mean, the idea of it made me a bit nervous – I didn’t want anything too harsh for my baby girl. But then I stumbled upon Carolina’s service and thought, “Why not just see what it’s about?” So, I set up a free discovery call, and honestly, that call changed everything. Carolina was super understanding and answered all my questions. She had this responsive approach to sleep training, which felt really comforting. It wasn’t just about sticking to a rigid plan; it was about adjusting to how my baby responded each night. I decided to go for it and got the phone support package, along with a personalized sleep plan. Let me tell you, the results were mind-blowing. By the fifth night, my daughter was actually sleeping through the night. And it wasn’t a fluke – she kept at it. Her naps got longer and more peaceful too. Carolina was like this sleep wizard – always there when I had a question or needed some reassurance. Her plan wasn’t just a bunch of steps; it was a thoughtful strategy tailored to my daughter’s needs, always keeping her comfort in mind. It’s crazy how much has changed. My baby is way happier and full of energy during the day, and I finally feel human again with all the rest I’m getting. If you’re struggling with your kiddo’s sleep, I can’t recommend Carolina enough. She’s got this gentle, responsive way of sleep coaching that works wonders. We’re just so grateful for these peaceful nights and happy days. Carolina, you’re a lifesaver!

originalText.text: Although my son is still very young to start sleep training, your advice has set him up for good sleeping habits. He is already sleeping through the night at 4 months old!! If you’re a parent in doubt, don’t hesitate to reach out to Carolina. She is patient, and will meet you where you’re at with realistic expectations.

If you’re a parent in doubt, don’t hesitate to reach out to Carolina. She is patient, and will meet you where you’re at with realistic expectations.

originalText.text:
I never write reviews, but feel obligate to share our experience with Carolina and Baby Sleeps Best. Our 8 month old was just not sleeping and it looked like there was no solution in sight. We spoke to Carolina and she assured us that we weren't alone, that she could help us. We were skeptical, but willing to try anything.

From the first conversation Carolina was clear, professional and caring. She evaluated our nursery, worked on a schedule and walked us through what the next few days/nights would be like. Within a night our son was sleeping through the night. It's hard to explain how simple, yet effective a process it was. When she left our home we were relieved, but still skeptical — ok, maybe more awe struck. This couldn't last.

Over the next 30 days, Carolina worked with us to stay on the schedule that she had developed for our son. Sometimes, I felt that she cared more than us! She's that kind of person. Our experience has been truly phenomenal. Our son is well rested and happier than ever.

If you're still reading this, call and speak to her. I promise you that she can help.

originalText.text: I was recommended Carolina by a friend and my wife and I are so lucky to have found her. She was able to help us tremendously with our baby and now we are happy to report that we sleep better because baby Anabelle sleeps better.

text.text: I was recommended Carolina by a friend and my wife and I are so lucky to have found her. She was able to help us tremendously with our baby and now we are happy to report that we sleep better because baby Anabelle sleeps better.

originalText.text: Carolina is incredible! One of the most empathic caring and smart people I ever met! She is very professional and extremely knowledgeable! Her approach is very gentle and scientific at the same time! I absolutely love her and would recommend to anyone who has a baby struggling with getting them to sleep or putting them on a right schedule! My 3 months old is much happier and healthier now that he sleeps better and we get a lot of free time as well as a good night sleep! Thank you so much Carolina!
